p: Research on anticancer and antimicrobial agents from natural sources should be continued in order to discover novel, more effective and less expensive drugs. Consequently, in our continuing search for valuable and promising natural products from Saudi medicinal plants, this study was carried. In the current study, we analyzed the chemical composition of the essential oils of three Plectranthus species namely P. cylindraceus, P. asirensis and P. barbatus by using GC/FID and GC/MS. The current study was further extended to investigate the anticancer, antimicrobial and antioxidant activities of these essential oils.
